messages.speech: Fast gaining popularity among the masses, Multimedia and Animation are the fields wherein maximum people are planning to make a career for themselves                                    The duration of animation courses offered at different animation colleges range from six months to two years. Interested candidates can pursue a 2D or 3D animation course. However, going by the trend these days it is advisable that one pursues a 3D animation course only. For more information about the colleges providing the course, you can visit- https://www.shiksha.com/animation/2d-3d-animation/articles/top-10-animation-colleges-in-india-blogId-10898
